name: REST-Client
description:
Create a REST client

1. Create a schema, example 'Book', make it inherit from 'SyncComponent', add properties
2. Create Book components
3. Run the application
4. Now all modications to Book components, will send POST/DELETE/PATCH requests to the server

note: you use this system with the 'REST server' example:

1. Export 'REST server' example in node.js format
2. Export 'REST client' example in HTML format 
3. Copy the generated HTML next to your 'REST server' example
4. Run the server
5. You can access to your HTML page. All modifications to the synchonized components will be send to the server.
